Sentence.string: I heard that the atmosphere within the troupe wasn’t at its best...

It wasn’t all rosy. The actors don’t feel affection for each other, the worst being Messrs Blayton and Norrington. Not a day went by without them yelling at each other. Mr Blayton was unpleasant with everyone here but Mrs Pitkins. I don’t really know why.
You mentioned some animosity between both lead actors. When was their last altercation ?
I might have heard them arguing yesterday, while other actors were ending the rehearsals. It was about an hour before the troupe went to have dinner in town.
No, I had to fix the curtain opening mechanism as soon as possible.
